responses: 0: There is a high degree of malapportionment. Vote/seat ratios across districts differ by as
1: There is a substantial degree of malapportionment. Vote/seat ratios across districts differ
2: There is some degree of malapportionment. Vote/seat ratios across districts differ by as
3: There is modest or no malapportionment. Vote/seat ratios across districts differ by less
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Is there a large discrepancy in the vote/seat ratio across electoral districts for the lower(or unicameral) chamber?
name: v3elmalalc
